statements: UPDATE user_activity_tracking SET successful = true WHERE user_id = 123

UPDATE user_activity_tracking SET successful = true WHERE user_id = 123 AND activity_type = 'login';
UPDATE user_activity_tracking SET username = 'JohnDoe', activity_type = 'logout' WHERE user_id = 456;
